text: 6.4: Ro 8.11; Ga 6.15; Ef 4.22-24; Kor 2.12; 3.10Nza Zisas Kraisan zɨn panan ruagi, ne khaŋ muuŋgi. Nza Krais phorgap rimgim, Fhe Bakɨme nza ndiav ana phorga mboga tɨgi fara muuŋgi. Ana won ŋkasŋka bakɨme, ana wom Krais khavgi. Ana maaŋ muuŋgim, nza vhɨra, nza tɨvar kama ndigi, nza mba tɨva zɨn ŋgɨrga.
